remarks: Closure of the scalar product operation for the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 12-Feb-2014.)
statement:
dvhfvsca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhfvsca.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dvhvscacl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. E /\ F e. ( T X. E ) ) ) -> ( R .x. F ) e. ( T X. E ) ) $.
